        public static String replaceLineBreaks(String input)
        Replaces all line separators with a single white space character. The line separator character (â¨) is forbidden in most modern browsers. These browsers won't render any text containing this character.

        public static String unescapeHtml(String input)
        Un-escapes all html escape characters. For example: Replaces "&amp;" with "&".

      • stripHtml

        public static String stripHtml(String input)
        Strips html like tags from the input. All content between tags, even non-html content is being removed.

      • sanitize

        public static String sanitize(String input)
        Aggressively removes all tags and escaped HTML characters from the given input and replaces some characters that might lead to problems for end users.
